name: G - B O T S : B I T F A L L
name_original: G - B O T S : B I T F A L L
description:
G - B O T S : B I T F A L L 

This is a PROTOTYPE RELEASE. 

This game was created over an intensive five-day period. There are various known and unknown bugs that have not been resolved, and a few features not yet implemented. Sorry for any glitches, as you are sure to encounter them. 

Your first level up will expand the columns +1, and your second level up will do it again, to a maximum of 8 columns in the game board. 

In multiplayer, clearing lines puts the blocks into other players' inbox.

Refresh the page to restart. 

Player 1 - W A S D - X to drop

Player 2 - Up Down Left Right - [Period] to Drop

Player 3 - U H J K - M to drop 

 

Created by Sandor Ligetfalvy

First prototype release: Feb 21, 2020
